# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the model parameters within a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing the model parameters

- **description**: A text representation of the model parameters.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.
